snippet: A group empaneled by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo suggested, among other things, extending the number of school days in New York State and making teachers pass the equivalent of a bar exam.
abstract: New York Education Reform Commission submits preliminary recommendations for reforming New York's public education system in address to Gov Cuomo and state cabinet members; stresses urgency in reforming system that is first in country in state education spending but has abysmal graduation rates; Cuomo will use panel's report to construct state educational agenda to be delivered in State of the State address.
lead_paragraph: A group empaneled by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo suggested, among other things, extending the number of school days in New York State and making teachers pass the equivalent of a bar exam.

headline.main: Commission Recommends Core Changes in Education
headline.print_headline: Commission Recommends Core Changes In Education
